description: From the Latin compendium (“that which is weighed together; a sparing, a saving, an abbreviation”), from com- (“with”) + pendō (“I weigh”).

entries.meaning: A short, complete summary; an abstract.

definitionGroups.group: A list or collection of various items.

entries.meaning: A collection of board games packaged in a single box.
(pharmaceutical industry) A collected body of information on the standards of strength, purity, and quality of drugs.
